title: Chocolate cheesecake with white chocolate icing
description: This no-bake cheesecake is a stunner and wonderfully rich recipe, so it will serve a good crowd for dessert.
ingredients: 1 x 400g/14oz packet chocolate digestives, crushed to fine crumbs
400g/14oz milk chocolate (35% cocoa solids), or you can use a mixture of 300g/10½oz milk chocolate and 100g/3½oz dark chocolate (70% cocoa solids)
